content.html: This is complete disrespect for the to the open source community. Definitely NOT OK. Furthermore, how would you ever trust Copilot to such complex code? If it is good, it is a plain copy without attributions. If the copy is imperfect, it will have random bugs.
content.value:
This is complete disrespect for the to the open source community. Definitely NOT OK. 

Furthermore, how would you ever trust Copilot to such complex code?
If it is good, it is a plain copy without attributions. If the copy is imperfect, it will have random bugs.
